meanings.definition: The world of the dead or the underworld.
meanings.sent1: Legends speak of mysterious netherworlds where spirits roam.
meanings.sent2: In some cultures, netherworlds are believed to be realms of darkness.
meanings.sent3: The ghost got lost on its way to the netherworlds and ended up in a haunted house instead.
meanings.sent4: The author's imagination delved into the netherworlds of the afterlife, creating vivid scenes.
meanings.sent5: The netherworlds whispered secrets of the departed, echoing through the night.

meanings.definition: A place or state of existence that is below the earth or beneath the surface.
meanings.sent1: Miners ventured into the netherworlds of the deep mines, seeking precious minerals.
meanings.sent2: Caves can sometimes lead explorers to hidden netherworlds beneath the ground.
meanings.sent3: The lost puppy dug a hole in the backyard, creating its own tiny netherworlds.
meanings.sent4: The roots of the ancient tree reached into the netherworlds of the soil, anchoring it firmly.
meanings.sent5: The artist's painting depicted a surreal netherworlds beneath the city streets.
